Age Calculator with Birthday Calculator: Know Your Exact Age and Next Birthday
Instant Age Calculation and Birthday Countdown

Age Calculator with Birthday Calculator is a must-have Chrome extension that provides a simple and accurate way to calculate your exact age in years, months, and days based on your birthday. Plus, it shows you a countdown to your next birthday! Perfect for personal use, age tracking, or planning celebrations.

Key Features
•	Precise Age Calculation
Quickly determine your exact age in years, months, and days, all from your browser.
•	Birthday Countdown
See how many days are left until your next birthday, so you can plan ahead!
•	User-Friendly Interface
Easy to use with a clean, intuitive design that makes age calculation a breeze.
•	No Setup Required
Install and start using immediately—no complicated configuration needed.
•	Lightweight and Fast

The extension runs smoothly in the background without slowing down your browsing experience or affecting device performance.

Why Choose Age Calculator with Birthday Calculator?
Tracking your age and planning for your next birthday has never been easier. Whether you're curious about how old you are or want to prepare for your upcoming celebration, this extension is perfect for both fun and practical use. It's fast, accurate, and simple to use!
Download Age Calculator with Birthday Calculator now and start tracking your age with ease!
